sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>When a time worked record is been saved, a record in Harvest will be created with the relevenat information.</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>requested</approval> <assigned_to display_value="Rachel Rowlandson">45ccd59e4f2863007e72aa95d310c767</assigned_to> <assignment_group display_value="GB3" name="GB3">242324124fa463007e72aa95d310c748</assignment_group> <category display_value="Integration">62c04d3f4fac23007e72aa95d310c77b</category> <company display_value="GB3">b771e09e4f6463007e72aa95d310c784</company> <description>When a time card is being saved (either by saving a record or stopping a time card), the time card will be send to Harvest for that user / task / company</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 03:00:00</estimated_hours> <notes/> <number>TAS0001136</number> <package display_value="PACK0001015">ad90a6b24f60e3007e72aa95d310c7c7</package> <short_description>Harvest Integration - Put Time Card</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>New</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-27 09:01:52</sys_created_on> <sys_id>31d81fe94ff867007e72aa95d310c780</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-27 09:01:52</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
